> >I think that would be a great idea, minus the fact that occasionally
> it is fun to slaughter through parts of a scenario where appropriate.
> 
> That's why I would prefer that this new idea would be a new type of
> scenario to acoid confusion with the old scenarios unless you create a
> new code indicating dynamic experience level.

We could add the experience level data into a new "version 7" scenario
format to preserve older scenarios.
